reviews.text: I recommend not to choose the rooms on the right side of the entrance starting with numbers 4 and 5. They are different, more modest than those in the hotel photos. The beds were comfortable though. In the evening only cold water flowed. A bonus is the wide breakfast buffet.

Stayed there in 2023. Room was smelly and dirty, with outdated furniture and facilities. In general, it felt like a reminiscent from the Soviet era. Breakfast was nothing special, just didn't remember it. The only good thing is location, quite close to the center, on a relatively quiet street, with a free parking. To sum up: nothing catastrophic, but got disappointed after accidentally selecting such place for a stay during my visit to Riga.
Visited this hotel in May 2024. Very good place to stay in quiet area. Rooms are clean and comfortable. Excellent breakfast for everyone. Very welcome personnel.
Peacefull place. About 15 min to center by tram. Good food.

Small, relatively cheap hotel. I was there for a week, and the service was good, but the rooms were not of outstanding quality. Some parts of the wall were damaged, and a switch was broken. The location is good if you want to visit the University as I did. Otherwise, it is pretty far to go to the city center or old town.
